cab.content: Circulated by the Secretary of State for India.secret.From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 4&h December 1917. (Received at India Office 8 pan.)Secret. Weekly report, North-West Frontier quiet. -Turkish emissaries have been expelled by Kulo Khel AMdis and crossed into Afghanistan. : Chin disturbance separately reported.There were 3,086 desertions during October, of whom 1,207 have been apprehended.
